title: Data Analyst
benefits: Band 6 salary range $95,799 - $104,420 plus 12% superannuation; Flexible working arrangements; Training and development opportunities; Study assistance; Paid parental leave; Health and wellbeing program with gym and pool access; Active social club; Employee Assistance Program (EAP); Inclusive and diverse workplace culture
summary: Join the City of Port Phillip’s dynamic team to deliver data-driven insights supporting strategic projects and community services.
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and design end-to-end BI solutions.
Develop and maintain dashboards and reports using Power BI and ERP tools.
Use Python and R for advanced data analysis, modelling, and automation.
Cleanse, manage, and secure data to ensure integrity and reliability.
Support testing activities, maintain documentation, and contribute to continuous improvements.
Bring strong skills in Power BI, DAX, R, Python, and experience with large datasets.
Knowledge of TechnologyOne ERP systems, Azure, and ServiceNOW is advantageous.
